languages.text: В отсутствие Вольного Торговца ксеносы нанесли удар в самое сердце протектората и захватили династическую усадьбу. Возглавьте контратаку и уничтожьте захватчиков.
In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counter-attack and destroy the invaders.
languages.original_text: В отсутствие Вольного Торговца ксеносы нанесли удар в самое сердце протектората и захватили династическую усадьбу. Возглавьте контратаку и уничтожьте захватчиков.

traits.locale_text: In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the trade empire and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counterattack and destroy the invaders.
In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the trade empire and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counterattack and destroy the invaders.
In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the trade empire and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counterattack and destroy the invaders.
In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counterattack and destroy the invaders.

languages.text: 行商浪人离开的这段期间里，异形对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的核心区域进行了袭击，还占领了王朝的宫殿。领导部队进行反击，消灭入侵者。
languages.original_text: In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counter-attack and destroy the invaders.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人离开的这段期间里，异形对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的核心区域进行了袭击，还占领了王朝的宫殿。领导部队进行反击，消灭入侵者。

languages.text: 自由開拓者が不在の間に、異種族は保護領の中心部に打撃を与え、王朝の帝殿を占領した。反撃を主導し、侵略者を打倒しなければならない。
languages.original_text: In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counter-attack and destroy the invaders.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が不在の間に、異種族は保護領の中心部に打撃を与え、王朝の帝殿を占領した。反撃を主導し、侵略者を打倒しなければならない。

languages.text: En ausencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los xenos han azotado el mismo corazón del protectorado y han capturado el palacio de la dinastía. Lidera el contraataque y extermina a los invasores.
languages.original_text: In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counter-attack and destroy the invaders.

traits.locale_text: En ausencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los xenos han azotado el mismo corazón del protectorado y han capturado el palacio de la dinastía. Lidera el contraataque y extermina a los invasores.

languages.text: Während der Abwesenheit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} haben die Xenos dem Herzen des Protektorats einen schweren Schlag versetzt und den Palast der Dynastie eingenommen. Führe den Gegenangriff an und vernichte die Eindringlinge!
languages.original_text: In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counter-attack and destroy the invaders.

traits.locale_text: Während der Abwesenheit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} haben die Xenos dem Herzen des Protektorats einen schweren Schlag versetzt und den Palast der Dynastie eingenommen. Führe den Gegenangriff an und vernichte die Eindringlinge!

languages.text: En l'absence {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les xénos ont frappé en plein cœur du protectorat et ont capturé le palais dynastique. Mener la contre-attaque et éliminer les envahisseurs
languages.original_text: In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counter-attack and destroy the invaders.

traits.locale_text: En l'absence {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les xénos ont frappé en plein cœur du protectorat et ont capturé le palais dynastique. Mener la contre-attaque et éliminer les envahisseurs

languages.text: Zenolar, Hür Tacir'in yokluğunda protektoranın kalbine ciddi bir darbe vurup hanedanlık sarayını ele geçirdi. Karşı saldırıyı yönetip istilacıları ortadan kaldır.
languages.original_text: In the Rogue Trader's absence, the xenos struck a blow at the very heart of the protectorate and captured the dynastic palace. Lead the counter-attack and destroy the invaders.

traits.locale_text: Zenolar, Hür Tacir'in yokluğunda protektoranın kalbine ciddi bir darbe vurdular ve hanedanlık sarayını ele geçirdiler. Karşı saldırıyı yönet ve istilacıları yok et.
